metadata.subject: Mathematics
metadata.curriculumTopic: Number and Algebra, Measurement and Geometry, Statistics and Probability

questions.question: What is 19 - 7?
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.contentForEmbedding: What is 19 - 7? 19 - 7 = 12. Take away 7 from 19 to get 12.

questions.question: Maria had 38 stickers. She gave away 13 stickers to her friends. How many stickers does she have left?
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.contentForEmbedding: Maria had 38 stickers. She gave away 13 stickers to her friends. How many stickers does she have left? 38 - 13 = 25. Maria has 25 stickers left.

questions.question: What is 49 - 15?
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.contentForEmbedding: What is 49 - 15? 49 - 15 = 34. Subtract 15 from 49 to get 34.

questions.question: Jake had 45 marbles. He lost 27 marbles at the playground. How many marbles does he have now?
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.contentForEmbedding: Jake had 45 marbles. He lost 27 marbles at the playground. How many marbles does he have now? 45 - 27 = 18. Jake has 18 marbles left.

questions.question: What is 75 - 25?
questions.explanation: 75 - 25 = 50. Seven tens minus two tens equals five tens, so 75 - 25 = 50.
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.contentForEmbedding: What is 75 - 25? 75 - 25 = 50. Seven tens minus two tens equals five tens, so 75 - 25 = 50.

questions.question: Emma read 87 pages of a book. She still has 24 pages left to read. How many pages has she already read?
questions.explanation: If the book has 87 pages total and 24 pages are left, then 87 - 24 = 63 pages have been read.
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.contentForEmbedding: Emma read 87 pages of a book. She still has 24 pages left to read. How many pages has she already read? If the book has 87 pages total and 24 pages are left, then 87 - 24 = 63 pages have been read.

questions.question: What is 81 - 36?
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.contentForEmbedding: What is 81 - 36? 81 - 36 = 45. Use regrouping: 81 - 36 = 45.

questions.question: There were 42 birds in a tree. 14 birds flew away. How many birds are still in the tree?
questions.explanation: 42 - 14 = 28. There are 28 birds still in the tree.
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.contentForEmbedding: There were 42 birds in a tree. 14 birds flew away. How many birds are still in the tree? 42 - 14 = 28. There are 28 birds still in the tree.

questions.question: What is 92 - 22?
questions.explanation: 92 - 22 = 70. Nine tens minus two tens equals seven tens, so 92 - 22 = 70.
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.contentForEmbedding: What is 92 - 22? 92 - 22 = 70. Nine tens minus two tens equals seven tens, so 92 - 22 = 70.

questions.question: Lily had 29 pencils. She gave 19 pencils to her classmates. How many pencils does she have left?
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.contentForEmbedding: Lily had 29 pencils. She gave 19 pencils to her classmates. How many pencils does she have left? 29 - 19 = 10. Lily has 10 pencils left.

questions.question: What is 40 - 9?
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.contentForEmbedding: What is 40 - 9? 40 - 9 = 31. Take away 9 from 40 to get 31.

questions.question: Sam collected 27 shells at the beach. He gave 12 shells to his sister. How many shells does he have now?
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.contentForEmbedding: Sam collected 27 shells at the beach. He gave 12 shells to his sister. How many shells does he have now? 27 - 12 = 15. Sam has 15 shells left.

questions.question: What is 368 - 245?
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.contentForEmbedding: What is 368 - 245? 368 - 245 = 123. Subtract ones: 8 - 5 = 3. Tens: 6 - 4 = 2. Hundreds: 3 - 2 = 1. Result = 123.

questions.question: A library had 381 books. They lent out 246 books. How many books are left in the library?
questions.explanation: 381 - 246 = 135. There are 135 books left in the library.
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.contentForEmbedding: A library had 381 books. They lent out 246 books. How many books are left in the library? 381 - 246 = 135. There are 135 books left in the library.

questions.question: What is 501 - 189?
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.contentForEmbedding: What is 501 - 189? 501 - 189 = 312. Use regrouping to subtract: 501 - 189 = 312.

questions.question: A farm had 359 chickens. The farmer sold 224 chickens. How many chickens are left on the farm?
questions.explanation: 359 - 224 = 135. There are 135 chickens left on the farm.
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.contentForEmbedding: A farm had 359 chickens. The farmer sold 224 chickens. How many chickens are left on the farm? 359 - 224 = 135. There are 135 chickens left on the farm.

questions.question: What is 703 - 225?
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.contentForEmbedding: What is 703 - 225? 703 - 225 = 478. Subtract using regrouping: 703 - 225 = 478.

questions.question: The school ordered 502 pencils. Students used 187 pencils. How many pencils are left?
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.contentForEmbedding: The school ordered 502 pencils. Students used 187 pencils. How many pencils are left? 502 - 187 = 315. There are 315 pencils left.

questions.question: What is 781 - 127?
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.contentForEmbedding: What is 781 - 127? 781 - 127 = 654. Subtract each place value: 781 - 127 = 654.

questions.question: Maya had 601 stickers. She used 356 stickers for her project. How many stickers does she have left?
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.contentForEmbedding: Maya had 601 stickers. She used 356 stickers for her project. How many stickers does she have left? 601 - 356 = 245. Maya has 245 stickers left.

questions.question: What is 948 - 136?
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.contentForEmbedding: What is 948 - 136? 948 - 136 = 812. Subtract using place values: 948 - 136 = 812.

questions.question: A concert hall has 612 seats. 267 people attended the show. How many empty seats were there?
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.contentForEmbedding: A concert hall has 612 seats. 267 people attended the show. How many empty seats were there? 612 - 267 = 345. There were 345 empty seats.

questions.question: What is 1000 - 1?
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.contentForEmbedding: What is 1000 - 1? 1000 - 1 = 999. Subtracting 1 from 1000 gives 999.

questions.question: The zoo had 834 visitors yesterday. Today they had 378 fewer visitors. How many visitors were there today?
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.contentForEmbedding: The zoo had 834 visitors yesterday. Today they had 378 fewer visitors. How many visitors were there today? 834 - 378 = 456. There were 456 visitors today.

questions.question: What is 1801 - 567?
questions.explanation: 1801 - 567 = 1234. Use regrouping to subtract across multiple places: 1801 - 567 = 1234.
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.contentForEmbedding: What is 1801 - 567? 1801 - 567 = 1234. Use regrouping to subtract across multiple places: 1801 - 567 = 1234.

questions.question: A factory made 3245 toys this month. Last month they made 1789 toys. How many more toys did they make this month?
questions.explanation: 3245 - 1789 = 1456. They made 1456 more toys this month.
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.contentForEmbedding: A factory made 3245 toys this month. Last month they made 1789 toys. How many more toys did they make this month? 3245 - 1789 = 1456. They made 1456 more toys this month.

questions.question: What is 4605 - 1849?
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.contentForEmbedding: What is 4605 - 1849? 4605 - 1849 = 2756. Subtract with regrouping across thousands: 4605 - 1849 = 2756.

questions.question: A stadium sold 4242 tickets for Saturday's game and 1897 tickets for Sunday's game. How many more tickets were sold on Saturday?
questions.explanation: 4242 - 1897 = 2345. Saturday sold 2345 more tickets than Sunday.
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.contentForEmbedding: A stadium sold 4242 tickets for Saturday's game and 1897 tickets for Sunday's game. How many more tickets were sold on Saturday? 4242 - 1897 = 2345. Saturday sold 2345 more tickets than Sunday.

questions.question: What is 6065 - 2576?
questions.explanation: 6065 - 2576 = 3489. Use regrouping to subtract the larger numbers: 6065 - 2576 = 3489.
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.contentForEmbedding: What is 6065 - 2576? 6065 - 2576 = 3489. Use regrouping to subtract the larger numbers: 6065 - 2576 = 3489.

questions.question: A school has 6131 students total. If 2875 students are in the upper grades, how many are in the lower grades?
questions.explanation: 6131 - 2875 = 3256. There are 3256 students in the lower grades.
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.contentForEmbedding: A school has 6131 students total. If 2875 students are in the upper grades, how many are in the lower grades? 6131 - 2875 = 3256. There are 3256 students in the lower grades.
